products.name: Basic Tee
products.imageAlt: Front of men's Basic Tee in black.
products.details: Short-sleeved crew-neck jumper made from stretch-viscose bamboo jersey, an iconic fabric that stands out for its soft, comfortable feel and perfect fit. Personally chosen and worn by  Armani as the perfect complement to numerous looks, a hallmark garment of a sleek and highly versatile elegance.

additionalDetails.value: Machine wash cold. Tumble dry low.
